title: pavana kumara sudhAkara lOcana
sahitya:
pavana kumAra sudhAkara lOcana pAhi maithili Artti bhanjana 
bhava sAgara taraNa tAraka ramaNa shaila sanjIvi taraNa samIraNa


anupallavi

  bhuvana pAla satya pOSaka raghu pungara vara priyakara dUta tAraka samEta 
				(madhyamakAla)
puruhUta vairi garva bhanjana puNya vidhAyaka jana manaranjana


caraNam    gAna rAga svara gati laya vara shrI gAyaka nArada sannuta pAda 
kAma mOha rahita bhakti rasArNava kanja mAdhrI nayana samOda
dIna sharaNya divipati varENya dinakara sacara navAgama bOdha
				(madhyamakAla)
divya guNa nikAya dIna sahAya jita tithi kula kala hakirisa makAya
bhavyakara shira raghu rAmadAya paulastya mada haraNAnjanEya vara
